languages.text: "Хорошо. Но я даю ему последний шанс рассказать правду".

traits.locale_text: "Хорошо. Но я даю ему последний шан рассказать правду".

languages.text: "Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо. Но я даю ему последний шанс рассказать правду".

traits.locale_text: "Fine. But I'm giving him his last chance to tell the truth."
"Fine. But I'm giving him his last chance to tell the truth."
"Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."
"Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."
"Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."

languages.text: «Bien. Le daré una última oportunidad para contar la verdad».
languages.original_text: "Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Bien. Le daré una última oportunidad para contar la verdad».

languages.text: 「いいだろう。彼に真実を話す最後のチャンスを与えよう」
languages.original_text: "Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「いいだろう。彼に真実を話す最後のチャンスを与えよう」

languages.text: “好吧，我给他最后一个机会，让他说出真相。”
languages.original_text: "Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，我给他最后一个机会，让他说出真相。”

languages.text: « Soit. Je vais lui donner une dernière chance de dire la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Soit. Je vais lui donner une dernière chance de dire la vérité. »

languages.text: "Na gut. Ich werde ihm eine letzte Chance geben, die Wahrheit zu sagen."
languages.original_text: "Fine. I shall give him one last chance to tell the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Na gut. Ich werde ihm eine letzte Chance geben, die Wahrheit zu sagen."

languages.text: "Tamam. Ona hakikati söylemesi için son bir şans vereceğim."
